title: @Stanford Court Receives TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award

meta_description: Stanford Court San Francisco Receives TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award
short_description: Stanford Court San Francisco Receives TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award
long_description:
Stanford Court San Francisco Receives TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award

We are humbled to announce that Stanford Court Hotel has been awarded TripAdvisor’s Certificate of Excellence. The TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence is awarded to properties that consistently achieve outstanding traveler reviews on TripAdvisor. The Certificate of Excellence honors accommodations, restaurants and attractions that consistently receive great traveler reviews on TripAdvisor.

 

Founded in 2010, the Certificate of Excellence honors hospitality businesses that deliver consistently great service. This designation is given to establishments that have consistently achieved great traveler reviews on TripAdvisor over the past year.

 

On behalf of everyone at the Stanford Court Hotel, we want to thank our guests who have stayed with us and shared their experiences on TripAdvisor. We always strive to provide our guests with the best service we can!
